French Onion Dip

Executed 9 December 2018; WIP

Ingredients

  • 2 medium onions, sliced thinly
  • 2 cloves garlic
  • 1c sour cream
  • 2 tbsp mayonnaise
  • parsley/salt/pepper to taste

Directions

  1. Caramelize onions over med/low heat until deep brown, deglazing with water as needed
  2. Place all ingredients into food processor and mix until uniform
